txt.en: Orcs can be found with Eryn Cordovath.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs in the orchard.
The Orkish patrol has already made it to the orchard and must be dealt with

'It saddens me that much of the orchard burns. I've spent many days playing in Eryn Cordovath. Hopefully, we will be able to rebuild from what is left of the orchard back into something as wonderful as it was before the invasion upon these lands.'
Tolwin can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Tolwin.

'The look-out said the band of Orcs were at least a dozen strong. If we do not get to the orchard quickly, I fear our beautiful trees will be destroyed.\n\n'Please go to Eryn Cordovath at once and stop this band of Orcs before the orchard is no more!'
A look-out has spotted a band of Orcs headed for Eryn Cordovath, a nearby orchard that is in the process of being evacuated. Tolwin wishes for you to ride out there and assist the farmers.
Eryn Cordovath is located north-west of Crithost.\n\nTravel to Eryn Cordovath and assess the situation.
Travel to Eryn Cordovath and assess the situation
